## Description
&#10;&#9;&#9;Halite, commonly known as rock salt, is the mineral&#10;&#9; &#9;form of sodium chloride (NaCl).

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Compound|
|Form:|Solid|
